name: How We Stay In Touch When Zuzalu Ends ğŸ«‚ğŸŒ (So Our Connections Never End)
description:
The worst part of Zuzalu is that it has to end.

There are SO many things that made Zuzalu magical.

What I'll miss most is the breakfasts at Kiki's, where all of us have been able to connect effortlessly and spontaneously with each other in a deep, human way.

How do we stay in close touch in a way that doesn't feel like work when we leave?

I have some ideas but would love to hear yours :)
